channel.description: Recent content in election on underWater desert Blogging

item.title: Understanding the Somaliland Elections (2 of 3): The Contenders
item.description: Today Somaliland is holding its Presidential elections. To understand the significance of this event, one must understand the road that it has taken the Somalilanders to get to this point. This election has been delayed for over two years. This entry contains a small background on the three men on the ballot.

item.title: Understanding the Somaliland Elections (3 of 3): The Arguments
item.description: Today Somaliland is holding its Presidential elections. To understand the significance of this event, one must understand the road that it has taken the Somalilanders to get to this point. This election has been delayed for over two years. This entry contains a small background on the arguments that have been given by three men on the ballot.
